    • Field Detail

      • hostelRooms

        private HostelRoom[] hostelRooms
        An array of hostel rooms

      • MAX_NUMBER_OF_HOSTEL_ROOMS

        static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_HOSTEL_ROOMS
        Maximum number of rooms any hostel can accommodate. Currently our new campus can only have hostels with a max capacity of 100 rooms per hostel

        Adds a room to a hostel
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • calculateMaintenanceCost

        public int calculateMaintenanceCost​()
        Calculate the maintenance cost of the entire hostel.
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the maintenance cost of the hostel
